title: Here are the 30 nominees for SA's top 20 restaurants
text:
Here are the 30 nominees for SA's top 20 restaurants Who will make it onto the coveted list of top 20 restaurants in the country? 24 Oct 2019





Eat Out, South African’s largest restaurant guide, is set to host the prestigious Eat Out Mercedes-Benz Restaurant Awards at GandWest in Cape Town on 17 November. There, they’ll announce the top 20 restaurants for 2019 before finally revealing the Eat Out Restaurant of the Year.

Here are the 30 nominees for this year’s awards.



Eat Out’s professional reviewers visit restaurants anonymously and pay for their meals in full. Visit the website and follow the brand on social media for the latest news, or download the Eat Out app to find the perfect restaurant for your next meal!



Image credit: Claire Gunn | Salsify Instagram
description: Who will make it onto the coveted list of top 20 restaurants in the country?
